com.ibm.mce.sdk.api

Class MceBroadcastReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • com.ibm.mce.sdk.api.MceBroadcastReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventBroadcastHandler

    public abstract class MceBroadcastReceiver
extends BroadcastReceiver
implements EventBroadcastHandler
    This class listens to SDK events and calls the relevant method when an event is detected. In order to handle the events, you have to override the events handling method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.ibm.mce.sdk.api.broadcast.EventBroadcastHandler

        EventBroadcastHandler.LocationEventType, EventBroadcastHandler.LocationType
